string-array.item: In traditional Spider-Man canon, Gwen Stacy is Peter Parker\'s girlfriend. However, she tragically died when taken captive by the Green Goblin. Her death made comics history as the first time a hero was failed to rescue his girl.\n\nBut in alternate universe Earth-65, Gwen Stacy transforms from tragic victim to hero. That\'s right, in this world, Gwen Stacy received spider powers in lieu of Peter Parker. Then, in a flipped fate, Gwen is unable to save Peter after his transformation into the Lizard.

Deadpool\'s name comes from his time at Hospice (the alleged government facility where failed superhuman operatives were treated. During this time, Deadpool and a host of others were experimented on by Doctor Killbrew and Ajax. Due to the sadistic and tortuous nature of the experiments, patients placed bets in a \"deadpool\" on who they expected to expire first. Following his escape, Wade Wilson then took on the name Deadpool, becoming the merc with a mouth who we all know and love.
